title: Caroline
brief_description: A story about a half caste indian girl who after her parents death, goes to live with her grandparents. But her grandfather, who was against her parents’ marriage, has difficulty in accepting Caroline as his own. However, Caroline is a courageous girl who works at gaining his acceptance and affection.
